name: Angry Socialist Soldier
description:
Game title: Angry Socialist Soldier

Context:

Made by Sonja Hranjec in less than 34 hours at Global Game Jam 2023 from February 3rd to 5th, at Algebra University location in Zagreb, Croatia.

Global theme was "roots" and local theme was "Slavic culture".

Plot:

One of the biggest parts of Slavic culture is being oppressed under foreign government. In 1940s, most of European Slavics were under horrible nazi-fascist dictatorship, daily civilian shootings, slavery, prejudices and all the other horrible evil that comes with it. 

But Mara nicknamed "Magare" (or "Donkey" on English) had enough of it! This is her story of taking her chances against occupator forces. 

Mara Magare was Angry Socialist Soldier.

Genre:

First Person Shooter (FPS)

Mission statement:

Liberate your village from nazi troops.

Platforms:

Windows & Linux PC

Controls:

WASD - to move

SPACE - to jump

LEFT MOUSE - to shoot

R - to reload

Pro tip: "Don't run straight forward while shooting, always strafe."
